name: 蔡宜學
objective:
本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦與網路通訊基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理與通訊網路，四、資訊管理，五、資訊與通訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界與多彩多姿的應用服務，七、電腦與網路的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會與行動網路。
This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer and network communication; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession and communication network; 4.data control; 5.internet and mobile network; 6.multimedia and applications; 7.computer virus and network security; 8. the world of information and mobile network.
